title: Romani people
summary: The Romani (also spelled Romany /ˈroʊməni/, /ˈrɒ-/), colloquially known as Roma, are an Indo-Aryan ethnic group, traditionally nomadic itinerants living mostly in Europe, and diaspora populations in the Americas. The Romani as a people originate from the northern Indian subcontinent,[69][70][71] from the Rajasthan, Haryana, and Punjab regions of modern-day India.[70][71]
